name: Credit Gladly
description:
Photograph by Jeff Shay of a Portland, Oregon mural that was recently removed after gracing our city for decades. The timing of its loss at the height of the current financial crisis just adds to our fondness for the image and sentiment.

Archival inkjet print. Unframed. Ships flat.

name: Franklin Liberty Bell broadside
description:
These words of wisdom from Ben Franklin are as relevant today as they were in 1759.

An 11x14 inch woodcut and letterpress printed broadside. Unframed. Ships flat.

name: WYSIWYG broadside
description:
Today's letterpress printers live in a strange world, dominated by digital type, but constantly finding modern applications for more traditional materials and techniques.

This broadside, with its nod to the digital lingo for laying out type on screen, is a hand-printed type sampler using wood and metal fonts available at Buzzworm Studios.

12x18.5 inches. Unframed. Ships flat.

name: Letterpress Cards for Politicians
description:
Want to make sure your expression of disdain, dissatisfaction or disgust reaches a politician, candidate or other unworthy party? Frustrated that emails and signature campaigns aren't getting through? Try a more personal approach.

These cards are letterpress printed with vintage type cuts originally used in a local mortuary and magnesium cuts for the modern type. We particularly like the irony of the typo in the "Intelligble" cut in our Disdain series!

Set of five cards and matching envelopes with pre-paid "first class forever" postage to make outrage easy. Printed on FSC 100% recycled paper in a renewables-powered studio to maximize moral authority. Choose from:

  • Disdain: insincere, incapable, unIntelligble, disaffection and indignity
  • Dissatisfaction: disservice, incorrect, unthoughtful, discomfort and inconsideration
  • Disgust: unfaithful, disrespect, indecision, inappropriate, undevoted

name: Letterpress Cards for Office Supply Nerds
description:
Back in the day, business and office supplies were printed on letterpresses—everything from letterhead to business cards to forms. If you and your friends are like us, and have a nerdy habit of frequenting old fashioned office supply stores looking for stamps, carbon paper forms and letterpress printed ephemera, these cards are for you.

Letterpress printed with Ludlow type metal slugs that were cast in our studio, FSC 100% recycled paper and renewable power.

Set of five cards and matching envelopes. Choose from:

  • Action set cover art: Rush, OK and three types of 'fists'
  • File set cover art: Received, Renewed, Approved, Entered and Answered
